intro.heading: Experience A Blend of Nature, Comfort, and Luxury
intro.paragraph1: Nestled among the rice fields and coconut trees of Tabanan, Ulaman is only 20 minutes away from the vibrant town of Canggu.
intro.paragraph2: An award-winning eco-luxury resort offering a unique hideaway experience. Embrace authenticity, balance, and harmony with nature in a healing, luxurious environment.

rooms.name: Floating Lake
rooms.subtitle: A luxurious floating villa on Ulaman's bio-filtered lake.

rooms.name: Cocoon Jungle
rooms.subtitle: Indulge in an unparalleled blend of exotic elegance and coziness.

rooms.name: Avatar Tree House
rooms.subtitle: Experience luxury in an avatar-inspired sky villa with 180° views.

rooms.name: Grand Lagoon Private Pool
rooms.subtitle: Indulge in an exclusive riverside villa with jungle lagoon view.

rooms.name: Jungle Garden Pool
rooms.subtitle: An ultimate private pool retreat at Ulaman.

rooms.name: Ulin Poolside
rooms.subtitle: A luxurious jungle ground-floor oasis with direct access to the infinity pool.

wellness.headline: Discover your path to wellness and growth.
wellness.text: At Ulaman we redefine luxury as an experience that not only pampers the senses but also nurtures the soul. Nestled in pristine nature, our eco-luxury retreat offers a sanctuary for healing and transformation. With specialized programs year-round, enjoy dedicated attention and care, immersing yourself in rejuvenation, or profound inner change through meticulously curated activities and treatments. Your transformative journey begins here.

spa.headline: A world-class gastronomic journey where nature’s finest ingredients meet culinary craftsmanship.

facilities.name: Holistic Spa
facilities.description: Rejuvenate your body and soul with our world-class holistic spa treatments.

facilities.name: Organic Restaurant
facilities.description: Dine on fresh, locally-sourced, and organic farm-to-table cuisine.

facilities.name: Yoga Shala
facilities.description: Find your center at our breathtaking bamboo yoga shala overlooking the river.

facilities.name: Jungle Gym
facilities.description: Stay active in our unique fitness center equipped with state-of-the-art machines.

facilities.name: High-Speed Wi-Fi
facilities.description: Stay connected with complimentary high-speed internet across the entire resort.

facilities.name: Complimentary Parking
facilities.description: Enjoy peace of mind with our secure and complimentary on-site parking.
